name: Sambatra
description:
This is a retro survival horror game I made back in 2008 when I just started in the game industry. Available now for free.

A mysterious disease has wiped out the earth of nearly all humans. In a last attempt to survive, you decide to escape to a secret underground bunker 10000 feet beneath the earth.

After three years in this extremely isolated place, you start to have hallucination and disturbing nightmares. But this is nothing compare to what awaits you one night, when you have a visit from a very special guest…
